original_text: And he slew it; and Moses took of the blood of it, and put it upon the tip of Aaron's right ear, and upon the thumb of his right hand, and upon the great toe of his right foot.
korean_text: 모세가 잡고 그 피를 가져다가 아론의 오른쪽 귓부리와 그의 오른쪽 엄지 손가락과 그의 오른쪽 엄지 발가락에 바르고

sentences.original_text: and Moses took of the blood of it
and put it upon the tip of Aaron's right ear
and upon the thumb of his right hand
and upon the great toe of his right foot
